_text_: All financial institutions are required by federal law to obtain, verify and record information that identifies each customer before opening an account with us. When you open an account with us, we will ask you for your name, address and other information that will allow us to identify you, such as Social Security number and date of birth. In addition, if the account application is approved, do we have your permission to open your account prior to sending you a copy of our XYZ Bank US Consumer Privacy Notice, which will be sent with your customary account disclosures?
name: kony.ui.Label
